79aac213-1e80-4f49-898a-b0662c695140.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
79aac213-1e80-4f49-898a-b0662c695140.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

0ceb6de7-4bfc-4146-b466-58b123781f24.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.
0ceb6de7-4bfc-4146-b466-58b123781f24.name: Weapon Bond

44bc53a2-f6d0-4b75-9ba5-cae997d2b37b.name: Legal Enforcement Powers (@Federal or Secret Service@)

c15b811f-9162-4d97-a261-d3eb0dfc5cf1.name: Wise Master
c15b811f-9162-4d97-a261-d3eb0dfc5cf1.notes: Choose 20 points. You can add your template's IQ-, Will-, or Per-based skills.

3b8a862e-d00c-4499-9d73-97699f118f9a.name: Weapon Master (Ninja Weapons)
3b8a862e-d00c-4499-9d73-97699f118f9a.notes: Anything with an Asian name or Holdout 0 to -2.

3b53e573-f48e-4f73-aae8-781089b33638.name: Combat Reflexes
3b53e573-f48e-4f73-aae8-781089b33638.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

19c7a5d6-059e-4a16-a0a2-ab227a6123f7.notes: Only pay for hands or feet, not both
19c7a5d6-059e-4a16-a0a2-ab227a6123f7.name: Claws, Blunt (Hands)

aa99950e-25cd-4d02-85a8-eafd01616bb8.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture
aa99950e-25cd-4d02-85a8-eafd01616bb8.name: High Pain Threshold

8fcd863c-9e70-4ffc-afd9-dacefcc89e66.name: Martial Arts Perks
8fcd863c-9e70-4ffc-afd9-dacefcc89e66.notes: Distribute 15 points between these and Martial Arts Skills.

0c4a33ca-793f-4bde-8889-80f58c8b1791.name: Cowpoker
0c4a33ca-793f-4bde-8889-80f58c8b1791.notes: Must wear pointy-toed boots. Unarmed skill bonuses apply.

91a1d648-d46c-41f4-9897-a7d8f006cc96.notes: Combine Mighty Blows and All Out Attack
91a1d648-d46c-41f4-9897-a7d8f006cc96.name: Focused Fury

d98700e7-e00e-4840-b6eb-178265b78999.notes: +1 per die of damage, but only upon disabled foes.
d98700e7-e00e-4840-b6eb-178265b78999.name: Finishing Move (@Attack@)

c7981508-bfe6-48c2-a34c-60020bd5c787.name: Urban Jungle Gym
c7981508-bfe6-48c2-a34c-60020bd5c787.notes: When not in combat, "urban" obstacles require no skill rolls and have no effect on Move.

8da813b2-8536-45ff-9488-4dfb737ca5f5.name: Trademark Move
8da813b2-8536-45ff-9488-4dfb737ca5f5.notes: +1 to @One turn of detailed combat actions@

8e398f5c-eddd-4a62-a89d-487bc152dcc9.notes: Free Intimidation attempt upon takedown. -5 in combat. +2 for knockout. +5 for fatality.
8e398f5c-eddd-4a62-a89d-487bc152dcc9.name: Deadly Pose

995e2673-7342-4161-ac7e-77618d8b1835.notes: No Bulk penalties; half Fast-Draw (Ammo) penalties; ignore Spraying Fire (p. B409)
995e2673-7342-4161-ac7e-77618d8b1835.name: Gunslinger

2488c9ed-c70a-4f6f-8f86-504891e34ec3.notes: +1 to all rolls made to ferry any important cargo or passenger.
2488c9ed-c70a-4f6f-8f86-504891e34ec3.name: Higher Purpose (Deliver the Package)

8792ea49-9293-4c92-9fe0-c6562eab3d0b.notes: +1 to all rolls made to heal someone, or get to them.
8792ea49-9293-4c92-9fe0-c6562eab3d0b.name: Higher Purpose ("Medic!")

918865ab-1357-4f3b-b60e-73427c5b1c70.name: Luck
918865ab-1357-4f3b-b60e-73427c5b1c70.notes: Usable once per hour of play

f7abfa4b-3051-4a93-ad03-2969393dda48.name: Luck, Ridiculous
f7abfa4b-3051-4a93-ad03-2969393dda48.notes: Usable once per 10 minutes of play

abbaf844-5d37-414c-8105-0322a89ee659.name: Luck, Extraordinary
abbaf844-5d37-414c-8105-0322a89ee659.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

51b5fe57-72b8-43f7-9190-9ff05c4710f8.name: Gunslinger
51b5fe57-72b8-43f7-9190-9ff05c4710f8.notes: No Bulk penalties; half Fast-Draw (Ammo) penalties; ignore Spraying Fire (p. B409)

8292b072-41ec-4802-a8c6-8a0e7498acba.name: High Pain Threshold
8292b072-41ec-4802-a8c6-8a0e7498acba.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

f894c716-7411-4711-82ae-b8fd97ddb82d.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)
f894c716-7411-4711-82ae-b8fd97ddb82d.name: Combat Reflexes

b1de4358-6d9c-4174-b3d8-b3791e444f4d.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction by Barbarians
b1de4358-6d9c-4174-b3d8-b3791e444f4d.name: Social Stigma (Barbarian)

38514626-e386-4af7-97d1-1ea9861aec3a.name: Social Stigma (Minority Group)
38514626-e386-4af7-97d1-1ea9861aec3a.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group

87170335-d53e-47af-8d3d-542ca5e0dfab.notes: -1 Reaction, -2 for cops & judges after public denouncement or visible sign
87170335-d53e-47af-8d3d-542ca5e0dfab.name: Social Stigma (Known Criminal)

9a7913f7-b1b6-4c3d-b94f-a74d9a26af87.notes: No intellectual respect; killing you is not a crime
9a7913f7-b1b6-4c3d-b94f-a74d9a26af87.name: Social Stigma (Perceived as an Animal)

6ba4ec84-3d0e-44f3-82ca-7d01b43bf55a.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat
6ba4ec84-3d0e-44f3-82ca-7d01b43bf55a.name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)

74289fab-5cee-4fd1-9a8f-254f575f2822.notes: -1 to HT rolls; lose FP at twice normal rate
74289fab-5cee-4fd1-9a8f-254f575f2822.name: Unfit

4f83559e-3a0e-4273-81a0-ca76d695946b.name: Very Unfit
4f83559e-3a0e-4273-81a0-ca76d695946b.notes: -2 to HT rolls; lose FP at twice normal rate; gain FP at half normal rate

dec2e600-b5ff-49fe-baf9-2b5671fe2adb.name: Bad Sight (Nearsighted)
dec2e600-b5ff-49fe-baf9-2b5671fe2adb.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

e078d767-462e-4758-b47e-64c9d3a32088.name: Chummy
e078d767-462e-4758-b47e-64c9d3a32088.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

a0f079c6-372a-4427-ae23-8f378a2b3b54.name: Intolerance (@Class, Ethnicity, Nationality, Religion, Sex, or Species@)

55e74060-0f03-4c33-86cc-ad4d7ea0ea9c.name: Insomniac (Mild)
55e74060-0f03-4c33-86cc-ad4d7ea0ea9c.notes: GM secretly rolls 3d for the number of days between episodes

65624076-afdd-423c-b556-99c4df22cd0c.name: Intolerance (@Rival nation or other large group@)

a30b3125-1a4b-4108-9ce9-2a1d9ba19ab9.notes: @Beat a specific rival or win a specific tournament@
a30b3125-1a4b-4108-9ce9-2a1d9ba19ab9.name: Obsession

03b5e7da-4d3a-420d-b9f9-9d8b9b3d7975.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less
03b5e7da-4d3a-420d-b9f9-9d8b9b3d7975.name: Chummy (Gregarious)

2d284c54-51ec-4a76-8615-24c418039974.notes: GM secretly rolls 2d-1 for the number of days between episodes
2d284c54-51ec-4a76-8615-24c418039974.name: Insomniac (Severe)
